sn32.13-52:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn32.13-52:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana unhavalahakanam devanam …pe…
sn32.13-52:1.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
sn32.13-52:1.11: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana vassavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32.13-52:1.14: So kayassa bheda param marana vassavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn32.13-52:1.15: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana vassavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
